scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push
scripts.commit-all: npm run commit ; cd securethebox-challenge ; npm run commit ; cd .. ; cd securethebox-client ; npm run commit
scripts.ps2: docker exec -u root -it securethebox-challenge_juice-shop_1 ps aux
scripts.stop2: docker exec -u root -it securethebox-challenge_juice-shop_1 forever stopall
